samples.context: Modern methods of irrigation help us to use water economically. The main methods used are as follows: (i) Sprinkler System: This system is more useful on uneven land where sufficient water is not available. samples.question: What is the purpose of a sprinkler system?

samples.context: When water is allowed to flow through the main pipe under pressure with the help of a pump, it escapes from the rotating nozzles. It gets sprinkled on the crop as if it is raining.
samples.question: How does the sprinkler system operate?

samples.question: What is the main advantage of the drip system?
